description: A game of checkers
Help Reeborg to set the board for a game of checkers.
Reeborg carries more than enough tokens and stars to complte this task.
The size of the board will be one of the following: 6x6, 8x8, 10x10 ou 12x12.
This problem is a real challenge.
You must not use variables.
You should already have solved the task Checkerboard: the great challenge
before attempting to solve this one which is even more difficult.
What you need to know
Everything you needed to know for Checkerboard: the great challenge
as well as knowing how to use function arguments.
You also need to know the names of two objects: 'token' and 'star'.
